metadata.title: CVE-2024-40969 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  f2fs: don't set RO when shutting down f2fs  Shutdown does not check the error of thaw_super due to readonly, which causes a deadlock like below.  f2fs_ioc_shutdown(F2FS_GOING_DOWN_FULLSYNC)        issue_discard_thread  - bdev_freeze   - freeze_super  - f2fs_stop_checkpoint()   - f2fs_handle_critical_error                     - sb_start_write     - set RO                                         - waiting  - bdev_thaw   - thaw_super_locked     - return -EINVAL, if sb_rdonly()  - f2fs_stop_discard_thread   -> wait for kthread_stop(discard_thread);
